name: Transporter Oil:Tanker Offroad
description:
So fasten your seat belt and get ready to experience real truck driving 2018. In this oil simulator game the big transport trucks are attached with a oil tanker. Start the engine of petrol tanker truck and deliver oil to city and petrol stations. The big truck drivers have a chance to become the best oil transporter by loading the petrol ,diesel, and oil in oil tanker truck and transport it to petrol station and green farms. To unload the petrol tank trailers you must be an expert trucker who can park the long vehicles in oil stations. It needs a real truck driver skills for parking oil tankers without any crash, blast or accident.

Practice your fuel truck simulator driving skills in the outbacks by playing new truck sim 2018 game. For the best truck driver this euro truck is powerful enough to deliver fuel cargo both in city roads and offroads. While delivering oil through city highway traffic, you need to follow the traffic rules on the highway roads to avoid any accident.

Features:
- Can be played offline
- New truck simulation game
- Multiple big 18 wheeler rigs
- Operate in big transport trucks
- Amazing truck simulation with reverse parking sounds
- Real truck interiors to drive in truck
- Challenging missions and campaign modes
- Free truck game 2018
